refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads the specified file and assigns the region attributes to the regions listed.

refsection.para: Reads the specified file and assigns the region attributes to the regions listed. The file is expected to be in the format produced by the wcodes command.
The example shows the use of the rcodes command to set the region-specific attributes according to the values found in the specified file.

info.title: Assign region-specific attributes to listed regions.

example.para: Reads the file named region_codes and sets the region-specific attributes according to the values found in the file.
